headline: Live Nation to invest $1 billion in US music venues
summary: This investment comes amid Live Nation's grown optimism in the live entertainment industry, driven by long-overdue ticketing reforms and growing fan demand.  Live Nation expects two-thirds of the concert fan growth to be in the second half of the year, Chief Financial Officer Joe Berchtold said in May.
